content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":93941,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お花の運び出しお願いします」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Please help carry out the flowers.\""},{"lineNumber":93942,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あいあいさー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, yes!\""},{"lineNumber":93943,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はいほーっ、はいほーっ♪","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Heigh-ho, heigh-ho♪"},{"lineNumber":93944,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お花が好きーっ♪」","translatedEnglishLine":"I love flowers♪\""},{"lineNumber":93945,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":93946,"originalJapaneseLine":"（本当は……","translatedEnglishLine":"(The truth is...)"},{"lineNumber":93947,"originalJapaneseLine":"　毎日苛められてる私を救い出してくれる……","translatedEnglishLine":"That someone would rescue me, who is bullied every day..."},{"lineNumber":93948,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そんな童話みたいな話に憧れてた……）","translatedEnglishLine":"I longed for a fairy tale story like that...)"},{"lineNumber":93949,"originalJapaneseLine":"（でも……","translatedEnglishLine":"(But...)"},{"lineNumber":93950,"originalJapaneseLine":"（ふふっ……","translatedEnglishLine":"(Hehe...)"},{"lineNumber":93951,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こんな賑やかな日々も……いいかも……）","translatedEnglishLine":"Maybe these lively days aren't so bad after all...)"},{"lineNumber":93952,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、姐さんー！　大変だー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, boss! It's bad news!\""},{"lineNumber":93953,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えっ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh?\""},{"lineNumber":93954,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おい、どうした！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, what happened!?\""},{"lineNumber":93955,"originalJapaneseLine":"「やべぇ、うちら目立ちすぎたんだ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Damn, we've stood out way too much..."},{"lineNumber":93956,"originalJapaneseLine":"　この辺のマフィア達が因縁をつけてきて……","translatedEnglishLine":"The local mafias around here started giving us trouble..."},{"lineNumber":93957,"originalJapaneseLine":"「数日以内にまとまった金を上納しねぇと","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If we don't pay them a lump sum within a few days,"},{"lineNumber":93958,"originalJapaneseLine":"　この花屋を潰すって……」","translatedEnglishLine":"they will shut down this flower shop...\""},{"lineNumber":93959,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh...\""},{"lineNumber":93960,"originalJapaneseLine":"エレナが否応なしに","translatedEnglishLine":"Elena was forced without choice"},{"lineNumber":93961,"originalJapaneseLine":"血吸いギーコを手にすることとなる","translatedEnglishLine":"to take up the blood-sucking Giko."},{"lineNumber":93962,"originalJapaneseLine":"数日前の話だった。","translatedEnglishLine":"This was a story from a few days ago."},{"lineNumber":93963,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えーと……これで全員、ですか……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Um... Is everyone here now...?\""},{"lineNumber":93964,"originalJapaneseLine":"「っすね。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah.\""},{"lineNumber":93965,"originalJapaneseLine":"　フラワー番地強盗団、全員揃いましたっす」","translatedEnglishLine":"The Flower District Robber Gang is all gathered.\""},{"lineNumber":93966,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それでエレナの姐さん、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So then, Boss Elena,"},{"lineNumber":93967,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今日は俺達を集めて何しようってんです？」","translatedEnglishLine":"what did you call us all together for today?\""},{"lineNumber":93968,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ、分かった！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, I got it!"},{"lineNumber":93969,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いつかみたいにクッキー焼いてくれたんすか！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Are you going to bake cookies like you did before!\""},{"lineNumber":93970,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや、今回はクッキーじゃなくて、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, this time it's not cookies,"},{"lineNumber":93971,"originalJapaneseLine":"　プリンかも知れないぞ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"maybe pudding...\""},{"lineNumber":93972,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あの、あの……ち、違う、違います……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Um, um... n-no, that's not it...\""},{"lineNumber":93973,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前ら黙ってろい！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You all shut up!"},{"lineNumber":93974,"originalJapaneseLine":"　姐さんが喋れねぇじゃねぇか！」","translatedEnglishLine":"You’re stopping the boss from speaking!\""},{"lineNumber":93975,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ささ、姐さん、どうぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Come on, boss, please go ahead.\""},{"lineNumber":93976,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":93977,"originalJapaneseLine":"エレナは申し訳なさそうに、深々と頭を下げた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Elena bowed deeply with an apologetic look."},{"lineNumber":93978,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……姐さん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Boss?\""},{"lineNumber":93979,"originalJapaneseLine":"「す、すみません……皆さん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-I'm sorry... everyone...\""},{"lineNumber":93980,"originalJapaneseLine":"「本日をもって……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"From today onward..."},{"lineNumber":93981,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私……皆さんの姐御を辞めます……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I... will be quitting as your boss...\""},{"lineNumber":93982,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh...?\""},{"lineNumber":93983,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えええええええええええ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ehhhhhhhhhh!?\""},{"lineNumber":93984,"originalJapaneseLine":"「というわけでして……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"And that’s the situation...\""},{"lineNumber":93985,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なるほど……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I see...\""},{"lineNumber":93986,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それを報告する為に、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So to report that,"},{"lineNumber":93987,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お前らムサ苦しくも俺の部屋に","translatedEnglishLine":"you all, as grimy as you are, came swarming into my room,"},{"lineNumber":93988,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ワラワラと来たのか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"hahaha.\""},{"lineNumber":93989,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えへへ、すんません……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hehe, sorry...\""},{"lineNumber":93990,"originalJapaneseLine":"　他に相談する方もいなくて」","translatedEnglishLine":"We didn’t have anyone else to talk to.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お花の運び出しお願いします」
毎日苛められてる私を救い出してくれる……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That someone would rescue me, who is bullied every day...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな童話みたいな話に憧れてた……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I longed for a fairy tale story like that...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな賑やかな日々も……いいかも……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe these lively days aren't so bad after all...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やべぇ、うちら目立ちすぎたんだ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Damn, we've stood out way too much...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この辺のマフィア達が因縁をつけてきて……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The local mafias around here started giving us trouble...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「数日以内にまとまった金を上納しねぇと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If we don't pay them a lump sum within a few days,
they will shut down this flower shop..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 血吸いギーコを手にすることとなる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to take up the blood-sucking Giko.
This was a story from a few days ago.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: フラワー番地強盗団、全員揃いましたっす」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Flower District Robber Gang is all gathered."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日は俺達を集めて何しようってんです？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: what did you call us all together for today?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつかみたいにクッキー焼いてくれたんすか！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Are you going to bake cookies like you did before!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや、今回はクッキーじゃなくて、
プリンかも知れないぞ……」
姐さんが喋れねぇじゃねぇか！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You’re stopping the boss from speaking!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エレナは申し訳なさそうに、深々と頭を下げた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Elena bowed deeply with an apologetic look.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私……皆さんの姐御を辞めます……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I... will be quitting as your boss..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前らムサ苦しくも俺の部屋に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you all, as grimy as you are, came swarming into my room,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他に相談する方もいなくて」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We didn’t have anyone else to talk to."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
